channel.title: Npcdrop error
channel.description:
I was trying to add npc drops. when i compiled, no errors, When I went to run server I got this.
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2037) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:547) at server.main(server.java:111)[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 05, 2009, 08:29:32 pm[/size][hr]bump

item.title: Npcdrop error
item.dc:creator: @dwarvenknight dwarvenknight
item.description:
@dwarvenknight wrote:

I was trying to add npc drops. when i compiled, no errors, When I went to run server I got this.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2037) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:547) at server.main(server.java:111)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 05, 2009, 08:29:32 pm[/size][hr]bump
